ABOUT ME

Hello, my name is Fares. I'm a self-taught web developer specializing in front-end development, with half a year of experience and proficient with HTML, CSS (Bootstrap, Tailwindcss), and Javascript.

My relationship with technology started at the very young age of 5 years old where it sparked a never-ending curiosity and motivation to learn more. I started having thorough and more serious learning in programming around 2015, where I have learned about the basic concepts of coding and PC building.

I'm constantly looking to expand my knowledge and skills to deliver high-quality services and prove to myself and people that nothing is impossible if you put your mind to it. I have reached comfortable levels in programming skills and worked on countless big and small/personal projects. Currently, I'm starting my freelancing adventure, which I invite you to discover and would make me so happy to share with you all.
